meanings.definition: A person who competes in slalom skiing.
meanings.sent1: The slalomists raced down the snowy slope with skill.
meanings.sent2: The group of slalomists trained hard for the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent3: The slalomists joked about their funny falls during practice.
meanings.sent4: The slalomists navigated the course like expert sailors on rough seas.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the crowd motivated the slalomists to ski faster and smoother.

meanings.definition: Those who participate in slalom racing.
meanings.sent1: All the slalomists gathered at the starting line, eager to begin the race.
meanings.sent2: The slalomists wore colorful outfits to stand out on the racecourse.
meanings.sent3: The slalomists celebrated their victories with a big feast.
meanings.sent4: The slalomists were like a flock of birds gracefully weaving through the gates.
meanings.sent5: The determination of the slalomists shone through as they crossed the finish line.
